ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would recommend this class to other students, especially those interested in theory. This class took students through a wide array of contemporary theoretical frameworks and schools, and through discussion, we were able to discover its relevance to anthropological theory and methodology.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I do not know whatI would do without this class. Not only was I able to learn a great deal of contemporary theory, but I was also able to learn to think critically, argue in an engaging way, and write convincingly.
